GIS


The GIS unit is responsible for maintaining the Town's Geographic Information System and creating maps & graphic products for multiple Town Departments. GIS is a computer system designed to capture, store, manipulate, analyze, manage and present all types of spatial or geographical data. GIS began in Manchester in 1999 and has steadily grown ever since.

Office Hours: 8:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m.
Phone: 860-647-3062
